thread.title: UK to ban laptops and other electronic devices on some flights
thread.title_full: UK to ban laptops and other electronic devices on some flights

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: UK to ban laptops and other electronic devices on some flights
text:
The UK is set to announce that it is banning laptops and electronic devices on certain flights.
The move echos a similar one made in the US which, citing unspecified threats, is barring passengers on nonstop, US-bound flights from eight mostly Middle Eastern and North African countries from bringing laptops, tablets, electronic games and other devices on board in carry-on bags.
Passengers flying to the United States from 10 airports will be allowed only cellphones and smartphones in the passenger cabins, senior Trump administration officials said. Larger electronic items must be checked.
The rules took effect early this morning in the US.
